Remove the unused private field '_graphic'.
Remove this unread private field 'polygonSymbol' or refactor the code to use its value.
Rename class 'DockpaneSearch_ShowButton' to match pascal case naming rules, consider using 'DockpaneSearchShowButton'.
Make sure that using this pseudorandom number generator is safe here.
Remove the unnecessary Boolean literal(s).
Use a StringBuilder instead.
Merge this if statement with the enclosing one.
Remove the unused local variable 'wmsLayers'.
Refactor this method to reduce its Cognitive Complexity from 24 to the 15 allowed.
Refactor your code not to use hardcoded absolute paths or URIs.
Remove the unused local variable 'queryResult'.
Marcar assemblies com NeutralResourcesLanguageAttribute

CA1824.fullDescription: O atributo NeutralResourcesLanguage informa o ResourceManager do idioma usado para renderizar os recursos de uma cultura neutra para um assembly. Isso melhorará o desempenho da pesquisa para o primeiro recurso carregado e poderá reduzir o conjunto de trabalho.

CS0168.shortDescription: A variável foi declarada, mas nunca foi usada

CS1570.shortDescription: O comentário XML tem XML possui formato incorreto

CS1591.shortDescription: O comentário XML ausente não foi encontrado para o tipo ou membro visível publicamente
CS1591.fullDescription: A opção de compilador /doc foi especificada, mas um ou mais construtores não tinha comentários.

S101.shortDescription: Types should be named in PascalCase
S101.fullDescription: Shared naming conventions allow teams to collaborate efficiently. This rule checks whether or not type names are using PascalCase. To reduce noise, two consecutive upper case characters are allowed unless they form the whole type name. So, MyXClass is compliant, but XC on its own is not.

S1066.fullDescription: Merging collapsible if statements increases the code’s readability.

S1075.fullDescription: Hardcoding a URI makes it difficult to test a program: path literals are not always portable across operating systems, a given absolute path may not exist on a specific test environment, a specified Internet URL may not be available when executing the tests, production environment filesystems usually differ from the development environment, …​etc. For all those reasons, a URI should never be hardcoded. Instead, it should be replaced by customizable parameter.

S1125.shortDescription: Boolean literals should not be redundant
S1125.fullDescription: Redundant Boolean literals should be removed from expressions to improve readability.

S1135.fullDescription: TODO tags are commonly used to mark places where some more code is required, but which the developer wants to implement later.

S1144.shortDescription: Unused private types or members should be removed
S1144.fullDescription: private or internal types or private members that are never executed or referenced are dead code: unnecessary, inoperative code that should be removed. Cleaning out dead code decreases the size of the maintained codebase, making it easier to understand the program and preventing bugs from being introduced.

S1481.shortDescription: Unused local variables should be removed
S1481.fullDescription: If a local variable is declared but not used, it is dead code and should be removed. Doing so will improve maintainability because developers will not wonder what the variable is used for.

S1643.shortDescription: Strings should not be concatenated using '+' in a loop
S1643.fullDescription: StringBuilder is more efficient than string concatenation, especially when the operator is repeated over and over as in loops.

S2245.shortDescription: Using pseudorandom number generators (PRNGs) is security-sensitive
S2245.fullDescription: Using pseudorandom number generators (PRNGs) is security-sensitive. For example, it has led in the past to the following vulnerabilities:

S3776.shortDescription: Cognitive Complexity of methods should not be too high
S3776.fullDescription: Cognitive Complexity is a measure of how hard the control flow of a method is to understand. Methods with high Cognitive Complexity will be difficult to maintain.

S4487.fullDescription: Private fields which are written but never read are a case of "dead store". Changing the value of such a field is useless and most probably indicates an error in the code.
